lead_paragraph: An article on Friday about the federal perjury investigation of Roger Clemens misidentified a law enforcement office connected to another high-profile inquiry, one involving Senator Ted Stevens of Alaska. It is the Department of Justice’s criminal division in Washington, not the separate United States attorney’s office for the District of Columbia.
